52 struct HitEnum {
53  enum PxHitFlags : uint16_t
54  {
55  kPOSITION = (1 << 0),
56  kNORMAL = (1 << 1),
57  kUV = (1 << 3),
58  kASSUME_NO_INITIAL_OVERLAP = (1 << 4),
59  kMESH_MULTIPLE = (1 << 5),
61  kMESH_ANY = (1 << 6),
62  kMESH_BOTH_SIDES = (1 << 7),
64  kPRECISE_SWEEP = (1 << 8),
67  kMTD = (1 << 9),
69  kFACE_INDEX = (1 << 10),
70 
71  kDEFAULT = kPOSITION | kNORMAL | kFACE_INDEX,
72 
74  kMODIFIABLE_FLAGS = kMESH_MULTIPLE | kMESH_BOTH_SIDES | kASSUME_NO_INITIAL_OVERLAP | kPRECISE_SWEEP
75  };
76 };
77 typedef QFlags<HitEnum::PxHitFlags> HitFlags;
78 Q_DECLARE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(HitFlags)
79 
80 template <typename HitType>
82 class PhysicsHit {
83 public:
84  static_assert((std::is_base_of<physx::PxRaycastHit, HitType>::value ||
85  std::is_base_of<physx::PxSweepHit, HitType>::value ||
86  std::is_base_of<physx::PxOverlapHit, HitType>::value), "Invalid hit type");
87 
88  static bool constexpr IsRaycastOrSweep = std::is_base_of<physx::PxRaycastHit, HitType>::value || std::is_base_of<physx::PxSweepHit, HitType>::value;
89 
90  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
93 
94  PhysicsHit(const HitType& hit) : m_hit(hit){
95  }
96  ~PhysicsHit() {
97  }
98 
100 
101  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
104 
105  physx::PxRigidActor* actor() const { return m_hit.actor; }
106  physx::PxShape* shape() const { return m_hit.shape; }
107  SceneObject* sceneObject() const {
108  return (SceneObject*)m_hit.actor->userData;
109  }
110 
112 
113  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
116 
117  int faceIndex() const { return m_hit.faceIndex; }
118 
120 
121  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
124 
127  bool hadInitialOverlap() const {
128  static_assert(IsRaycastOrSweep, "Invalid hit type");
129  m_hit.hadInitialOverlap();
130  }
131 
133  HitFlags flags() const {
134  static_assert(IsRaycastOrSweep, "Invalid hit type");
135  uint16_t pxFlags = (uint16_t)m_hit.flags;
136  // Workaround for lack of |= integer operator
137  HitFlags flags = Flags::toFlags<HitEnum::PxHitFlags, uint16_t>(pxFlags);
138  auto flagInt = (uint16_t)flags;
139  if (flagInt != pxFlags) Logger::Throw("Error, bad time");
140  return flags;
141  }
142 
144  Vector3 position() const {
145  static_assert(IsRaycastOrSweep, "Invalid hit type");
146  return PhysicsManager::toVector3(m_hit.position);
147  }
148 
150  Vector3 normal() const {
151  static_assert(IsRaycastOrSweep, "Invalid hit type");
152  return PhysicsManager::toVector3(m_hit.normal);
153  }
154 
156  float distance() const {
157  static_assert(IsRaycastOrSweep, "Invalid hit type");
158  return m_hit.distance;
159  }
160 
162 
164  const HitType& m_hit;
165 };
166 typedef PhysicsHit<physx::PxRaycastHit> PhysicsRaycastHit;
167 typedef PhysicsHit<physx::PxSweepHit> SweepHit; // TODO: Implement in scene
168 typedef PhysicsHit<physx::PxOverlapHit> OverlapHit; // TODO: Implement in scene
169 
170 
177 template <typename HitType>
178 class PhysicsHits{
179 public:
180 
182  PhysicsHit<HitType> block() const { return m_hitBuffer.block; }
183 
185  bool hasBlock() const { return m_hitBuffer.hasBlock; }
186 
188  uint32_t getNumHits() const{
189  return m_hitBuffer.getNbAnyHits();
190  }
191 
193  uint32_t getNumTouches() const {
194  return m_hitBuffer.getNbTouches();
195  }
196 
198  void getTouches(std::vector<PhysicsHit<HitType>>& touches) const{
199  uint32_t numTouches = getNumTouches();
200  touches.reserve(numTouches);
201  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numTouches; i++) {
202  touches.push_back(m_hitBuffer.getTouch(i));
203  }
204  }
205 
207  void getHits(std::vector<PhysicsHit<HitType>>& hits) const {
208  uint32_t numHits = getNumHits();
209  hits.reserve(numHits);
210  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < numHits; i++) {
211  hits.push_back(getHit(i));
212  }
213  }
214 
216  PhysicsHit<HitType> getTouch(uint32_t index) const {
217  return PhysicsHit<HitType>(m_hitBuffer.getTouch(index));
218  }
219 
221  PhysicsHit<HitType> getHit(uint32_t index) const {
222  return PhysicsHit<HitType>(m_hitBuffer.getAnyHit(index));
223  }
224 
225  physx::PxHitBuffer<HitType> m_hitBuffer;
226 };
227 
231 class PhysicsRaycast {
232 public:
233 
234  bool hadHit() const {
235  return m_hits.getNumHits() != 0;
236  }
237 
238  PhysicsRaycastHit firstHit() const {
239  return m_hits.getHit(0);
240  }
241 
242  //real_g m_maxDistance = std::numeric_limits<real_g>::infinity();
243  real_g m_maxDistance = (float)1e30;
244 
245  Vector3 m_origin;
246 
248  Vector3 m_direction;
249 
251  PhysicsHits<physx::PxRaycastHit> m_hits;
252 };
